channel.title: CentOS on SwiSwiSwift
channel.description: Recent content in CentOS on SwiSwiSwift

item.title: Display a message at login (CentOS7)
item.description: If you are managing multiple servers, you may accidentally log in to a different server. The characters to be displayed at login are written in $/etc/motd.

item.title: Installing Rails on CentOS7
item.description: This is a note when Rails was installed on CentOS7. The final Nginx nginx.conf file can be found here.
